titles: The reasons vvhich Doctour Hill hath brought, for the vpholding of papistry, which is falselie termed the Catholike religion: vnmasked and shewed to be very weake, and vpon examination most insufficient for that purpose: by George Abbot ... The first part.
author: Abbot, George, 1562-1633.
publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, & are to be sold in Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Crowne by Simon VVaterson,
notes: A reply to: Hill, Edmund Thomas.  A quatran of reasons of Catholike religion.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Hill, Edmund Thomas, ca. 1563-1644. --  Quatran of reasons of Catholike religion --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
